articles.description: Period pain is quite common and if you are looking for something beyond hot water bottle and medicines, try vitamin D. It may help to het rid of period cramps.
articles.content: Period pain knocks on most women’s door every month without fail. While some try home remedies, others do yoga to relieve pain associated with period cramps. You can also give vitamin D a shot to do … [+4249 chars]
